controller

Class Extractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Extractor

  • public class Extractor
extends java.lang.Object
    This information extractor extracts information from the computer system environment. This information can be file-independent, and therewith valid for the whole environment, or file-dependent information.

    • Method Detail

      • extract

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Object> extract(java.util.Collection<Profile> profiles,
                                                             boolean isAsync,
                                                             boolean partsOnly)
        Start an extraction for all profiles in the HashSet. This will use all file dependent modules of each profile on the profiles files and the file independent modules to extract the environment.
        Parameters:
        profiles - set of Profiles to be extracted
        isAsync - flag whether the extraction can be executed asynchronous or synchronous.
        partsOnly - flag whether only file-dependent information should be extracted
        Returns:
        Future object

      • extractNewParts

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Object> extractNewParts(Part[] parts,
                                                                     Profile profile,
                                                                     boolean isAsync)
        Extract one specific Part belonging to a Profile. This will use all file dependent modules of the profile on the parts file. This method will be called, if a file has been modified.
        Parameters:
        parts - the parts to extract
        profile - the profile to extract, null ot extract on all profiles
        isAsync - flag whether the extraction can be executed asynchronous or synchronous.
        Returns:
        future object

      • setUpdateExtraction

        public void setUpdateExtraction(boolean updateExtraction)
        This method will enable or disable update extractions, if files were modified. Update extractions will be enabled in continuous extraction mode.
        Parameters:
        updateExtraction -

      • getUpdateExtraction

        public boolean getUpdateExtraction()
        Get the status, if update extractions are enabled or disabled. If updated extractions are enabled, the tool is in continuous extraction mode.
        Returns:
        status of update extractions

      • getDaemonsRunning

        public boolean getDaemonsRunning()
        Get the status, if the environment monitor daemons are running.
        Returns:
        status of running daemons

      • stopDaemons

        public void stopDaemons()
        Stops all daemon modules of all profiles.

      • startDaemons

        public void startDaemons()
        Starts all daemon modules of all profiles.
